TopicTitle: How to import my Career 0.24.2 improvements and saves in 0.25

Articles.Content:
Hi

Any possibility to keep all my career facts, improvements and saved games when opening 0.25 ?

Can I import all my settings, saves and persistent from 24.2 to 25 and how to do this?

I would like the next upgrade to allow us to open the game and import easily all our settings without having to open text edit, scroll the setting config and modify manually all what need to be modified....

and same remark for the persistent file in the saves folder....
Go into your .24.2 directory then go to saves choose your save and copy it over to the saves folder in the .25 directory.
Bear in mind though that some craft may look a little odd due to some parts being changed.
